about_the_game:
Welcome to Planet E1d0r4d0 is a story-driven RPG game about a young girl exploring the meaning of existence in a corner of the universe, including visual novel, simulation combined with side-scrolling hunting.

Inheriting (?)sister's tavern

In this chaotic and meaningless universe, before the end comes when even consciousness ceases to exist, please sit down in the late-night tavern 'Habitable Zone' deep in the mines and heartily down a big glass of the signature Golden Bee-ru...! Or gorging on meat!

You will play as Louise, a young girl from Earth, who receives a letter, a last will, from her sister who had gone ahead to work on Planet E1d0r4d0. The letter expresses her last wish for you to take over a small tavern she opened deep in the mines of the Planet of Gold.

Exploring by day, running the tavern at night... is the secret to everlasting youth

What if you run out of ingredients? There are many unbelievable creatures living in the underground caves. Go and brutally hunt them down – freshness is the key to successful cooking!

Worried about getting killed by native creatures? No problem! Soul cloning technology is mature enough... you now have infinite lives. Go ahead and die a few times to see what it's like!

Run your tavern during nighttime hours to discover the mystery of your sister's disappearance

Chat with the customers who come by, for their intriguing stories. Through fascinating conversations, figure out what exactly happened to your sister after she arrived at Planet E1d0r4d0.

Game Features

  • Pixel style graphics
  • Side-scrolling 2D adventure - go out exploring during the day, hunt primitive creatures, gather ingredients
  • Simulation - run your tavern at night to earn money and entertain guests
  • Fragmented Narrative - Learn the story through echo system devices, dialog, and narration scattered throughout the map.
  • Dark Humor

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains violence and sexual related contents in dialogues.

name: Welcome to Planet E1d0r4d0!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo and 2.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: WindowsR 8/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo and 3.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU / NVIDIA GeForce GTX750 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Welcome to Planet E1d0r4d0! is a story-driven game about a young girl exploring the meaning of existence in a corner of the universe, including visual novel, simulation combined with side-scrolling hunting. In this chaotic and disorderly universe, even infinite lives seem so fragile.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese*, Japanese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
